name: Storepay
description: Storepay is the first Buy now, Pay later fintech service-provider in Mongolia. Through its easy-to-use app, Storepay allows customers to make split payments for their purchases over time with no additional fees or interests. SPCFIN is the native currency of Storepayâ€™s services to enhance the purpose of providing equal and inclusive financial opportunities for everyone. SPCFIN is a BEP-20 token on Binance Smart Chain that provides smart digital payment and purchase bonus solutions to retail customers in Mongolia and across Asia.
